features: MAN BAR SOAP WHERE LATHER MEETS LUXURY – Our Man Bar is the perfect soap for whatever kind of many you are. We blend the finest ingredients in a variety of masculine fragrances to provide top quality personal care products. Use this bar soap at the sink or in the shower to leave your skin squeaky clean and refreshed
NO HARMFUL INGREDIENTS - Our products are natural in origin, and we never use harsh chemicals or synthetics like parabens, sulfates, phthalates, or silicones.

REVITALIZING - Science tells us that scent is the sense most connected to memory. And the exotic combination of radiant citrus, dewy florals and musk found in our Revitalizing Exotic Musk & Sandalwood bar will certainly make you memorable. But, you know, in a way that allows you to maintain your mysterious persona.

MAKES A GREAT GIFT - Give the gift of a routine upgrade so everyone can smell like a champion! The industry-leading packaging of Man Bar ensures that each bar is visually appealing and rugged enough for any adventure for any man

MADE IN THE USA AND CRUELTY FREE, NO ANIMAL TESTING - Our state-of-the-art soap & toiletries factory is located in southeastern Massachusetts. We take pride in our unique formulations that blend only the finest ingredients; no chemicals that are harmful to your skin. Our top-quality soap gently cleanses and leaves your skin feeling smooth and nourished, rather than stripped dry.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: San Francisco Soap Company Exotic Musk and Sandalwood Man Bar Make your manly skin smell and look amazing with the Exotic Musk and Sandalwood Man Bar from San Francisco Soap Company. The San Francisco Soap Company creates all their products with one goal in mind, to provide only high-quality products without using harmful fillers and chemicals that big label companies use. Our soap gently cleanses and leaves skin feeling smooth and nourished, rather than stripped and dry. We take pride in our unique formulation that blends only the finest ingredients. This bar is 10 oz. San Francisco Soap Company - USA Made We are a manufacturer of USA MADE personal care products. Our state-of-the-art facilities are located in southeastern Massachusetts. Our unique formulations are intended to keep your skin smooth and healthy. Our soaps are large, they are meant to last and not dissolve away to a bar of nothing like most soaps do! Be sure to check out our other listings for more fine quality long lasting soap for your skin and your hair! Be a Rockstar with Quality Ingredients Our products consist of unique formulas with no harmful ingredients. We are constantly developing new items and designs that we look forward to sharing with our customers, while adhering to the fine tradition of the exceptional locally made quality that embodies the San Francisco Soap Company. The Man Bar Product Line! The San Francisco Soap Company makes some amazing soaps in different formats that our customers love - all the way from hand soap in a pump bottle to bar soaps and soap on-a-rope! The soaps are large and long lasting. Check out the San Francisco Soap Company storefront to learn more about our product line.
You've tried the rest, now try the best!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is such a great soap! Smells awesome and is kind to your skin!My husband loves itHe is on his second bar. Each bar last for about 6 months!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful masculine scent and a bar size to match

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: BIG bar for the price. Could have more scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving the suds
reviews.reviewText: The scent is a bit too subtle for my tastes, but it makes for a satisfying shower by providing a foundation for the after shave and cologne to follow. I appreciate woodsy, evergreen scents. The wash cloth and that fat bar of soap produce lots of sudsy, cleansing goodness. I feel the price is worth the experience. The bar has a small batch feel rather than the mass produced hard feel found along most bath aisles in markets and big-box stores. The bar lasts a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good soap
reviews.reviewText: I really like using this soap. Has a great scent and lathers well. Wish it came in two 5 ounce bars instead of one 10 ounce bar, which is a bit clumsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the scents
reviews.reviewText: $10 is a lot for one bar of soap, but the bar is huge! Pair this bat with one of those African Net cloths and this bar will last a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great sized bar, the scent is amazing. Just wish scent lasted all day....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The go to man soap I love to smell on him.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid bar, but wish it had more scent to it. Mine has hardly any scent at all.
reviews.reviewText: Wish it had a stronger fragrance is all. Lather and weight of it are good quality otherwise.
